Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-4947 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-4947 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.30.3-7, affected by CVE-2025-4947
